channel.title: Large request
channel.description:
I'm wondering if people have ways of earning a minimum of 2 million gold per hour. The only way I know of is frost dragons (but I don't have 85 dungeoneering and I don't know how long it would take to get 85).
Basically, I want to earn 200 million in no more than 100 hours (mainly because I don't think I could push myself to over 100 hours). If anyone has any ideas, I'd love to hear them.
Thanks. :)

item.title: Large request
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:5, topic:411424”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=512685.msg3721135#msg3721135 date=1313946721]
Recover accounts and make alot like drub ;o
[/quote]

Drub didn’t make anything recovering. If you were referring to the 9th and 10th pages of the topic I made with the RS account names, he was just posting those as an inspiration to people so they won’t quit.[/quote]
This

Read full topic

item.title: Large request
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:20, topic:411424”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=512685.msg3721656#msg3721656 date=1313974966]

Get a RSPS, somehow get it popular, take RSGP donations.
That’s how I made 2 Santa hats and 50M.

That’s why Rsps is just as bad as runescape… why don’t users realize a gold donation doesn’t do anything?

It could do something, maybe the owner sells the gold he gets from players for irl money and uses it towards the vps/webhosting?
[/quote]

So you tricked your players into thinking you were selling the gold for vps/webhost, or did you sell it and after you had paid for the vps/webhost you bought a santa with the leftovers?[/quote]

I didn’t say I did that… I don’t tell my players anything. They run up to me saying ‘I WANT TO DONATE HOW MUCH IS IT’ so I tell them $5 and if they want they can spend the $5 on rsgp and still get donator stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Large request
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

the elve age:

MY clan knows a way for 2.2m an hour, but if I shared it wouldn’t last more than a week due to people making bots quick.

Mind sharing it with me? Not asking for a special consideration or anything, but I’d greatly appreciate it. Any way I can return the favor, I’ll be happy to.

Read full topic
